description: Sum of distinct prime divisors of p(n)*p(n-1) - 1.
prog: (PARI) sopf(n) = my(fac=factor(n)); sum(i=1, matsize(fac)[1], fac[i, 1]) ;a(n) = sopf(prime(n)*prime(n-1) - 1); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Sep 30 2013
author: _Clark Kimberling_
extensions: Offset set to 2 and a(1) removed by _Michel Marcus_, Sep 30 2013
